page.title: 04People and Jobs
page.content:
Some local residents work in the valley and some do not.The Forestry Commission employs a{head forester,}a {supervisor,}some{mechanics,}a{forest {clerk, joiners}and{craftsmen.}The {manager}of The Ormandy Hotel, the {licensee}of The Eagle's Head, the local{builder}the{handyman}and the {sculptor}are self-employed.
Some people have to go further afield to work. The{merchant seaman} travels all over the world, and there is an{engineer}who works in the offshore oil industry. A{mechanic, {secretaries; a government official}and a{driving school proprietor}all live in Grizedale; not forgetting a{teacher and a{groundsman}working in local schools.
